content: begin working back and forth across the heel stitches the instep stitches will not be used for this part place a marker at the center of the heel stitches between stitch 35 and stitch 36 dividing the stitches evenly row sole/heel side 1 sl1pw wyf-p36 to 2 stitches beyond the marker -p2tog-p1- 30 gusset stitches remain turn 2 sl1pw wyb-k5 to 2 stitches beyond the marker -k2tog-k1- 30 gusset stitches remain turn there will be a small gap between the working stitches that form the heel turn and the unworked gusset stitches remove marker when you come to it 3 sl1pw wyf-p6 to within 1 st of gap -p2tog closing the gap -p1- 28 gusset stitches remain turn 4 sl1pw wyb-k7 to within 1 st of gap -k2tog-k1-turn 28 gusset stitches remain 5 sl1pw wyf-p8 to within 1 st of gap -p2tog-p1-turn 26 gusset stitches remain 6 sl1pw wyb-k9 to within 1 st of gap -k2tog-k1-turn 26 gusset stitches remain 7 sl1pw wyf-p10 to within 1 st of gap -p2tog-p1-turn 24 gusset stitches remain 8 sl1pw wyb-k11 to within 1 st of gap -k2tog-k1-turn 24 gusset stitches remain 9 sl1pw wyf-p12 to within 1 st of gap -p2tog-p1-turn 22 gusset stitches remain 10 sl1pw wyb-k13 to within 1 st of gap -k2tog-k1-turn 22 gusset stitches remain 16 sl1pw wyb-k19 to within 1 st of gap -k2tog-k1-turn 16 gusset stitches remain 17 sl1pw wyf-p20 to within 1 st of gap -p2tog-p1-turn 14 gusset stitches remain 18 sl1pw wyb-k21 to within 1 st of gap -k2tog-k1-turn 14 gusset stitches remain 19 sl1pw wyf-p22 to within 1 st of gap -p2tog-p1-turn 12 gusset stitches remain 20 sl1pw wyb-k23 to within 1 st of gap -k2tog-k1-turn 12 gusset stitches remain 21 sl1pw wyf-p24 to within 1 st of gap -p2tog-p1-turn 10 gusset stitches remain 22 sl1pw wyb-k25 to within 1 st of gap -k2tog-k1-turn 10 gusset stitches remain 23 sl1pw wyf-p26
